name: The 13th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics
content: The 13th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics (SOPO 2021) Conference Date: October 29-31, 2021 Conference Venue: Guilin, China Website: https://www.soposymposium.org/2021/ Online Registration System: http://www.soposymposium.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1379 Email: sopo\_service@126.com The 13th International Symposium on Photonics and Optoelectronics (SOPO 2021) will be held from October 29-31, 2021 in Guilin, China. SOPO 2021 is co-organized by by Wuhan University, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, IPOC State Key Lab, and other institutions. SOPO is an annual conference in China since 2009\. It was held in Wuhan, Chengdu, Shanghai, Suzhou, Xi'an, Beijing, Guilin, Sanya and Kunming from 2009 to 2019\. Each year there are 100 - 200 attendees from Asia, Europe, America, etc., and there have been quite a lot of well known experts giving plenary speeches. In 2021, SOPO will be held from October 29-31 in Guilin, China. It dedicates to facilitating the global development of Photonics and Optoelectronics and exploring ways in which the latest research results can be shared. Invited Speakers Prof. Zefeng Wang, National University of Defense Technology (NUDT), China Prof. Elfed Lewis, University of Limerick Ireland, Republic of Ireland Prof. Mohamad Hafiz Mamat, Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM), Malaysia Prof. Oliver H. Afroozeh, University of Larestan, Iran Prof. Jingsong Li, Anhui University, China Prof. Jovana Petrovic, Technische Universität Berlin, Germany/Vinca Institute of Nuclear Sciences, University of Belgrade, Serbia Prof. Harith Ahmad, University Malaya, Malaysia Dr. Zhaoyang Zhang, Xi’an Jiaotong University, China Prof. Xuewen Shu, Wuhan National Laboratory for Optoelectronics (WNLO), Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China Publication and Presentation Publication: All the accepted papers will be published by a peer-reviewed open access journal that can ensure the widest dissemination of your published work. Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: 1\. If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System. 2\. Please download the Full Paper template and prepare your article according to it. The full length of one paper is suggested to be 8-10 pages (within the template format with all tables, figures and references). If your paper is over 10 pages, you will be kindly requested to pay for extra pages fees. 3\. The simple Abstract submission should include the title, contents, keywords, authors names, affiliations and emails. The length is suggested to be controlled within 1 page and no more than 2 pages. 4\. You will receive the review results within 3-5 working days after submission. If you do not get any notification within the time limit, please contact us as soon as possible. 5\. You are welcome to submit papers in Chinese and please contact us for more details. Contact Us Contact Person: Rolin (Ms) Email: sopo\_service@126.com Tel: +86 150 7134 3477 (Monday-Friday) QQ: 88431022 WeChat: 3025797047 Attendance Methods 1.Submit full paper (Regular Attendance+Paper Publication+Presentation) You are welcome to submit full paper, all the accepted papers will be published by "Optics and Photonics Journal"(ISSN: 2160-8881), a peer-reviewed open access journal that can ensure the widest dissemination of your published work. 2\.
